languages.text: Лорд-капитан обнаружил{mf||а}, что кибермастиф охранял волнующие размышления Соломона Антара, которыми он не предполагал делиться с окружающими.
The Lord Captain discovered that the cyber-mastiff was guarding Solomorne Anthar's disturbing musings, which he had not intended to share with others.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан обнаружил{mf||а}, что кибермастиф охранял волнующие размышления Соломона Антара, которыми он не предполагал делиться с окружающими.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain discovered that the cyber-mastiff was guarding Solomorne Anthar's disturbing musings, which he had not intended to share with others.
The Lord Captain discovered that the cyber-mastiff was guarding Solomorne Anthar's disturbing musings, which he had not intended to share with others.
The Lord Captain discovered that the cyber-mastiff was guarding Solomorne Anthar's disturbing musings, which he had not intended to share with others.
The Lord Captain discovered that the cyber-mastiff was guarding Solomorne Anthar's disturbing musings, which he had not intended to share with others.
The Lord Captain discovered that the cyber-mastiff was guarding Solomorne Anthar's disturbing musings, which he had not intended to share with others.

languages.text: Der Lord Captain hat entdeckt, dass der Cyber-Mastiff Solomorne Anthars verstörende Träumereien bewacht hat, die er nicht mit anderen teilen wollte.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain discovered that the cyber-mastiff was guarding Solomorne Anthar's disturbing musings, which he had not intended to share with others.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain hat entdeckt, dass der Cyber-Mastiff Solomorne Anthars verstörende Träumereien bewacht hat, die er nicht mit anderen teilen wollte.

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a découvert que le cyber-mastiff gardait les réflexions perturbantes de Solomorne Anthar, des écrits très personnels qu'il n'avait pas l'intention de partager avec qui que ce soit.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain discovered that the cyber-mastiff was guarding Solomorne Anthar's disturbing musings, which he had not intended to share with others.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a découvert que le cyber-mastiff gardait les réflexions perturbantes de Solomorne Anthar, des écrits très personnels qu'il n'avait pas l'intention de partager avec qui que ce soit.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは、サイバーマスチフがソロモーン・アンサールの不穏な考えを守っていたことを知った、それはソロモーンが他人と共有するつもりのなかったものだ。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain discovered that the cyber-mastiff was guarding Solomorne Anthar's disturbing musings, which he had not intended to share with others.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは、サイバーマスチフがソロモーン・アンサールの不穏な考えを守っていたことを知った、それはソロモーンが他人と共有するつもりのなかったものだ。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán descubrió que el cibermastín protegía los perturbadores pensamientos de Solomorne Anthar, que no tenía intención de compartirlos.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain discovered that the cyber-mastiff was guarding Solomorne Anthar's disturbing musings, which he had not intended to share with others.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán descubrió que el cibermastín protegía los perturbadores pensamientos de Solomorne Anthar, que no tenía intención de compartirlos.

languages.text: 行商浪人发现，生化獒犬看守的数据板上记载着索罗蒙·安萨想入非非的内容，而他本人并不希望这些内容被其他人看到。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain discovered that the cyber-mastiff was guarding Solomorne Anthar's disturbing musings, which he had not intended to share with others.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人发现，生化獒犬看守的数据板上记载着索罗蒙·安萨想入非非的内容，而他本人并不希望这些内容被其他人看到。

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, siber mastifin Solomorne Anthar'ın sır gibi sakladığı enteresan notlarını koruduğunu keşfetti.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain discovered that the cyber-mastiff was guarding Solomorne Anthar's disturbing musings, which he had not intended to share with others.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan, siber mastifin Solomorne Anthar'ın sır gibi sakladığı enteresan notlarını koruduğunu keşfetti.
